II fldgi – wêlrK
msgqj
iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —

Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 1136
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
1135 - B 80867 — 300 (2014/08)

i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g
wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk
whg m%udKj;a ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka
wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk
úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2014 iema;eïn¾ ui 12 jeks Èk
m< lrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2014 wf.daia;= ui 29 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh
hq;= h'
 2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m< l< hq;= njg hï
mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜
mS' tÉ' t,a' ù' o is,ajd"
rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s ^je' n'&'
2014 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'
ie' hq'- 2014'08'15 osk m< jQ wxl 1"876 ork .eiÜ m;%fha  I : III iy III  fldgia m< fkdù h'
ie' hq' - uy k.r iNd ^ixfYdaOk& mk;a flgqïm; 2014 wf.daia;= ui 01 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha
II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2014'08'221136
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
osid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - jdßhfmd,
ld,h bl=;a jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha mj;sk ,ÿj wjika ù jir mylg ^05& jvd merKs my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka  kvq jd¾;d jákdlula ke;s f,aLk
úkdY lsÍfï wd{d mkf;a ^479 wêldrh& 5 jeks j.ka;sfha úêúOdkj,g wkql+,j 2014'11'23 Èfkka miqj fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § úkdY
lsÍug iQodkï lr we;'
fuu kvq iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yjlrefjl= ;udg wjYH iïmQ¾K iy;sl msgm;la fyda hï fldgil msgm;la fyda f.dkqlr
we;s f,aLk ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï ta i|yd b,a,Sula 2014'11'23 jeks Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾jrhd fj; ,sÅ;j b,a¨ï l<
hq;= h'
kshñ; Èkg fmr tjeks b,a,Sula lsÍug fkdyels jqjfyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s ish¨ kvq jd¾;d 2014'11'23 Èfkka miq
fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajkq ,efí'
úkdY lsÍug kshñ; kvq jd¾;dj, wxl we;=,;a Wmf,aLkh fuhg wuqKd we;'
ta' fla' tï' mgne¢f.a"

08-668
osid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - ud;f,a
l,a bl=;aj we;s kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
ud;f,a ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj wjika lrk ,o j¾I mylg ^05& jvd merKs my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2014'11'15
Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQodkï lr we;'
02' fuu kvqj,g wod< hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvqfõ fyda kvqj, iïmQ¾K iy;sl msgm;la fyda hï fldgila fyda
kvqjg f.dkq lr we;s ,shú,a,la ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï ta i|yd b,a,Sula 2014'11'15 Èkg m%:ufhka fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ fj;
bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
03' tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqk fyd;a my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s ish¨u kvq jd¾;d 2014'11'15 Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha mq¿iaid
úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajkq ,efí'
úrdÊ rK;=x."
Èid úksiqre - ud;f,a'
2014 cQ,s ui 23 jeks Èk"
ud;f,a Èid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha § h'

<!-- page 17 -->

niakdysr m<df;a" fld<U Èia;%slalfha" fyajd.ï fldar,fha" ueo
m;a;=fõ" udÿ¿jdj msysá j¾I 1986 la jQ wf.daia;= ui 08 jeks Èk

lrk ,o wxl 76$1448 ork ie,iqï m%ldr ojg.y,kaoj;a; bvfuka
fnod fjka lrk ,o len,s wxl 5 A ork fldgig bvï W;=rg (

08-819
î' jhs' ;=vdfõ iudc i;aldrl moku ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls

hgf;a —î' jhs' ;=vdfõ iudc i;aldrl moku ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls˜ hkqfjka ye¢kafjk mk;a flgqïm;la md¾,sfïka;=fõ
§ bÈßm;a lsÍug woyia lrk nj fuhska oekqï foñ'
mk;a flgqïmf;a wruqK jkqfha my; i|yka fmdÿ mrud¾:j,ska hqla; jkakd jQ tlS moku ixia:d.; lsÍuhs (
1'  m%cdjg wjYH Tjqka ms<s.kakd Tjqkag ord.; yels ;sridr ixj¾Ok m%fõYhla l%shd;aul lsÍu ;
